question_text: A technician is choosing between fixed wireless and satellite for a rural installation. The site has line of sight to a nearby tower. What is the main reason to choose fixed wireless?
answer_options: Lower latency and faster speeds than satellite
correct_answer: Lower latency and faster speeds than satellite
explanation: Fixed wireless (WISP) typically offers much lower latency and better speeds than satellite and is preferable when line of sight is available.
